Microsoft 365 Planner is part of the Mic: Microsoft 365 Planner is part of the Microsoft 365 suite, offering lightweight task and bucket-based planning for teams. This integration supports creating plans, buckets, tasks, fetching them, deleting them, and custom API calls.
Create a bucket (category) under a plan.
Create a new planner task with title, as: Create a new planner task with title, assignments, due date, etc.
Remove a specific task by ID.
modify metadata of a plan (e.g. title ch: modify metadata of a plan (e.g. title changes).
Modify existing task fields: title, due: Modify existing task fields: title, due date, assignments, descriptions.
Retrieve details about a specific bucket: Retrieve details about a specific bucket.
Make a custom API call to a specific end: Make a custom API call to a specific endpoint
